review_data.title: Fine bagels in a traditional, family restaurant
review_data.content: I was there with a friend for a snack and a short meeting. Four different basic bagels with a large assortment of tasty condiments.

review_data.title: Chock full of flavor
review_data.content: We were on our way to the airport and felt like a bowl of soup. This place was perfect, my wife and I had their cream of tomato and it was scrumptious! And very reasonably priced.

review_data.title: Delicious "Tagessuppe"
review_data.content: The "Tagessuppe" and the "salmon bagel" were delicious. The service was fast and also professional. Looking forward for my next delicious Bagel at Babi's Bagel in Zurich.

review_data.title: Kosher Bagel in Zurich
review_data.content: It's a small Bagel Shop offering take-away, but also a few tables. The bagels are freshly made. Beside that they also serve salads, soups, pizza and deserts. Besides the pizza I can highly recommend that place.

review_data.title: Ok, aber kein zweites Mal
review_data.content: Als Snack zum Mittagessen habe ich mir in Babi's Bagel Shop einen Lachsbagel und einen Bagel mit Eiersalat bestellt. Beim...More

review_data.title: טעים, טרי ומסביר פנים
review_data.content: אנחנו בציריך כ4 ימים, ארוחת בוקר טעימה קלה ומהירה, זה פה, לא לפספס, גם נעים מאוד להיות פה, רוברטה שהיא...More

review_data.title: Quick lunch in the city
review_data.content: Tasty and quick meal! You can pick exactly what you want on your bagel, would recommend! Ingredients tasted fresh and the air conditioning was a nice break from the summer heat.

review_data.title: Homöopatischer Lachsbagel
review_data.content: Einen Lachsbagel bestellt für CHF 11.- bestellt. Aus meiner Sicht miserables Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis, da kaum Lachs darauf war und der Bagel...More

review_data.title: Good breakfast
review_data.content: We were there at 7:30am for breakfast. They had the basic bagel shop's staple and some Swiss specialties. The food was good and fresh and the coffee strong and flavorful.

review_data.title: Breakfast
review_data.content: Fast and delicious... was definitely worth the stop on the way to Israel. Will sure come back again...

review_data.title: NYC Bagel In Zurich
review_data.content: This a great little Jewish deli and bagels are fantastic - just like NYC bagel shops. Not a lot variety but all the main favorites as seen in New York. Everything, blueberry, plain, sesame and there maybe a few others. If you are craving a...More

review_data.title: Best Fresh Bagel's in Zurich
review_data.content: Most authentic and best bagle shop in Switzerland. I saw the sweet welcoming Bagelshop right at the Waffenplatzstrasse Tram station, so I stopped by quickly to try one. I had a Salmon Bagel. It was amazing! It was the most autenthic Bagle I had in...More

review_data.title: Not normal to be close not on a holiday
review_data.content: Very upset the restaurant was closed without any notice on the website ;) not sign no holiday. Always the same with this kind of restaurant

review_data.title: Small Bagel Shop at the park
review_data.content: Located close to Sihlcity Mall, Babi's Bagel Shop faces the Klopstockwiese (park) across the street. Place your order with the ingredients you would like and pay at the counter and within a moment your order is ready and brought to your table. The place specializes...More

review_data.title: Great Coffee and Bagel
review_data.content: Stooped for a quick breakfast and it was great. i have to recommend the Salmon Bagel, one of the best i had..

review_data.title: Great place, highly recommended!
review_data.content: I'm eating at Babi's regularly and always enjoy the food and great service there. From the bagels (best in town!) to the soups, Bierchermuesli and salads, everything is very fresh and delicious!

review_data.title: Frische Suppen
review_data.content: Ich hole mir hier gelegentlich zum Lunch eine Tagessuppe und einen Bagel zum Mitnehmen. Die Bagels lässt man sich nach...More

review_data.title: Excellent Bagels!
review_data.content: My family and I visited Switzerland recently and we ate here a couple of times. I'm a native New Yorker and I can tell you these are some of the best bagels I've ever had! While it is very pricey (approximately $3 for one plain...More
